translated_text:
Text:
> Can be classified into tools

There are many types of special investigation tools, which are easy to cause mismatch between functions and requirements. Therefore, it is necessary to uniformly manage various types of network special investigation tools, and annotate the functions of all tools, in order to standardize the use of various network special investigation tools, fully utilize their functional characteristics, and apply them to different special investigation business scenarios, further enhance the stability and usability of the tools, and ensure the stable and effective conduct of special investigation business.

> Beneficial for concealment and disguise

Network special investigation business is sensitive and must be conducted in a covert environment to avoid alerting the target and causing the special investigation mission to fail. Since the daily usage rate of laptops is relatively high, high-performance laptops can be used to carry special investigation tools, which is convenient for covert execution of special investigation business on one hand, and can improve the portability of the "individual toolset", making it easier to conduct special investigation business in various environments on the other hand.

Product Introduction

3.1 Product Introduction
The "individual toolset" is a cluster management platform for conducting penetration testing on various network sites, with a large number of built-in network special investigation tools that can be used as special investigation means to discover, utilize, and remotely control and manage targets, thereby obtaining data intelligence resources.

The platform uses high-performance laptops to cluster various network special investigation tools. Users only need to open the "individual toolset" and connect to the network to conduct special investigation work on the target.

3.2 Product Composition
The "individual toolset" is a professional collection of network special investigation tools, carried by a high-performance laptop to provide users with a good software running environment and penetration environment.

The main components of the "individual toolset" product list are as follows:

1. "Individual Toolset": 1 unit
2. Platform User Manual: 1 copy

3.3 System Architecture
The "individual toolset" mainly consists of the basic support layer, middle layer, and application layer. The basic support layer is the bottom layer architecture of the system, providing users with a good software running environment and penetration environment.

4.4 Code Audit

Integrate commonly used code audit tools to check for security vulnerabilities in the source code of the project, identify LD in the code, and facilitate further exploitation by penetration testers.

4.5 Webshell Tools

Integrate various command execution environments existing in the form of web files such as asp, php, jsp, or cgi, known as web shells. These tools can be mixed with normal web files in the web server's directory when conducting penetration testing on a target website. By accessing the asp or php web shell through a browser, a command execution environment can be obtained to control the target website server.

4.1.3. Service Content

From the date of acceptance, provide a 1-year service period.

1D) Free upgrade and update services for all software related to the entire project.
2) Free maintenance services for all hardware related to the entire project.

3) Provide 7*24 online service, with a fault response time not exceeding 0.5 hours, and provide solutions within the time frame. If on-site troubleshooting is required, dispatch professional engineers within 12 hours to the site to resolve the issue. The method of providing technical support services shall not be less than the following 5 types: phone, email, remote video, on-site service.

After the project is completed, provide complete technical documentation to the customer, including equipment random data, applications, and media.

During the project construction, if any issues arise, the company will dispatch professional after-sales engineers within 8 hours to provide free maintenance services, including but not limited to user manuals, administrator manuals, installation guides, etc.

4.1.4. Emergency Response Plan

In the event of major faults during the project construction, the company will dispatch professional after-sales engineers within 4 hours to ensure that the products and services purchased by the customer can be used normally.

4.1.5. Major Fault Emergency Response Plan

In the event of major faults during the project construction, the company will dispatch professional after-sales engineers within 4 hours to ensure that the products purchased by the customer can be used normally.

2. Project Service Commitment

To ensure the smooth operation of the project, during the warranty period:

1) The project warranty period is three years, ensuring normal operation, maintenance, and upgrades, with an adequate supply of spare parts. The company solemnly promises that within the warranty period, the company will provide timely maintenance. In case the products and services purchased by the customer cannot be used normally, the company will provide free maintenance for all software and hardware.

2) During the equipment installation period, the company will provide technical training and timely on-site handling of equipment abnormalities. The company will provide free replacement services for any deficiencies or malfunctions. If any faults or issues occur, the company will provide remote troubleshooting. If the fault cannot be resolved within 24 hours, the company will provide free on-site technical support within 24 hours.

The company will provide free technical support services 24/7 if equipment issues occur. The response time for technical support shall not exceed 1 hour.

(Group management)
4.4 Twitter lead monitoring
Lead monitoring is mainly for key suspicious Twitter accounts. Users can directly add targets to the platform, and the platform will automatically collect and analyze their information, and can set keywords according to needs. When the published tweets trigger the keywords, the system will promptly remind users to respond and handle.

4.4.1 "Lead monitoring"
The platform can view the list of added monitoring personnel, and the right tweet area defaults to display the user's latest 100 hours of tweets. At the same time, the platform supports deleting and grouping multiple monitoring personnel, clicking on a single target account to view, and loading the current account's tweet situation, loading one page at a time. At the same time, you can enter keywords in the promotion area to search for tweets containing the keywords of the controlled targets. Click on the target to view the target's tweets, followers, and fans, and view and download tweets related to the target Twitter account, pictures, and videos, and can add the target's fans and follow users to the monitoring target with one click.

original_text:
6 产品部署
6.1 适用环境
Twitter 全情导控系统适用于网络特侦部门对境外 Twitter 目标开展舆情监控和导控等作战声

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

景，平台提取目标 Twitter 价值信息，以实现 Twitter 舆情管控高效管理和监督。平台基于 SaaS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

云服务，用户只需通过授权账号登录到平台即可使用。
6.2 部署方式
Twitter 与博导控系统为 B/S 架构，为确保整个平台的安全稳定和可靠有效使用用户需将平

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

落

 

 

 

的客户端套件部署于境外 VPs 上,部署完成后, 本地客户端通过授权账号即可登录和使用。VPS

 

 

 

 

 

 

服务器和本地客户端参数要求如下:

 

配置环境                                                  环境参数

 

CPU: 双核

 

内存: 不低于4GB

 

 

 

 

 

服务器配置要求         硬盘: 不低于100GB

 

网络带宽: 不低于2Mbps

 

 

 

 

 

租用境外云主机方式进行搭建

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

7 ”产品优势

> ”数据量大

6 Product Deployment
6.1 Applicable Environment
The Twitter comprehensive control system is suitable for the network special operations department to conduct public opinion monitoring and control on overseas Twitter targets, extracting valuable information from the Twitter platform to achieve efficient management and supervision of Twitter public opinion. The platform is based on SaaS cloud services, and users only need to log in to the platform through authorized accounts to use it.

6.2 Deployment Method
Twitter and the Bo control system are based on a B/S architecture. To ensure the security, stability, and effective use of the entire platform, users need to deploy the client suite locally on overseas VPS. After deployment is completed, local clients can log in and use the platform through authorized accounts. The requirements for VPS servers and local client parameters are as follows:

Configuration Environment: Environment Parameters
CPU: Dual-core
Memory: Not less than 4GB

Server Configuration Requirements: Hard disk: Not less than 100GB
Network bandwidth: Not less than 2Mbps

Build using overseas cloud hosting services

7 Product Advantages
> Large Amount of Data
The system currently processes no less than one billion pieces of raw data per day and supports real-time updates of available data every day. Based on the submitted query information, results are returned within 3-5 minutes. The query data is comprehensive, including registered email addresses, phone numbers, common login locations, etc., which is beneficial for promptly detecting negative public opinion, illegal public opinion, rumors, etc., and enhancing the emergency response capabilities of government departments.
> Efficient Crawler Technology
The Twitter comprehensive control system supports the implementation of public opinion monitoring on target accounts, using distributed crawler technology to monitor Twitter accounts.

translated_text:
Preface

The internet has become another important media after newspapers, radio, and television, and has become one of the main carriers reflecting public opinion in society. Its unique interactivity in communication is something that previous media did not possess, especially in terms of freedom of speech and exchange of public opinion. Various data indicate that the number of internet users in China is increasing, and it is precisely because of the active participation of internet users that the outcomes of many events have changed. Therefore, it is crucial for public security agencies to do well in sentiment analysis and control work for social stability. Therefore, analysis must be conducted on public sentiment in order to control and guide it. In this trend, it is of great theoretical and practical significance for the government and public security agencies to actively manage and timely monitor public sentiment, follow up on public opinion, guide a healthy and positive social public opinion environment, and establish a sound long-term mechanism for guiding and controlling public sentiment, which is important for building a harmonious and stable online society.

With the development of information technology, it is necessary to explore reasonable public sentiment control and management methods to maintain a healthy online environment, thus playing an increasingly important role in maintaining social stability. Strengthening early warning and countermeasures for public sentiment is to promote public sentiment control, effectively regulate the content of public opinion, grasp the direction of public opinion, guide the power of public opinion, and play an immeasurable role in achieving two-way communication between party and government agencies and the public, promoting social harmony and cohesion. Online sentiment reflects social sentiment, and to grasp online sentiment, it is necessary to recognize that early warning and countermeasures for online sentiment are a systematic project that requires the participation of departments such as statistics, united front work, civil affairs, and public security. However, as the defender of social stability, public security agencies have a particularly special responsibility for early warning and countermeasures for online public sentiment in the entire social security prevention mechanism.

Currently, Twitter has become a gathering place for internet users to exchange opinions, and has become a focal point for internet public opinion governance, requiring significant resources, manpower, and financial investment for comprehensive supervision and regulation to combat and prevent various illegal online activities such as online rumors and cybercrimes. In dealing with online rumors and offenders, a "zero tolerance" attitude must be adopted to decisively combat them, not providing a breeding ground and space for the spread of online rumors, collectively creating a fresh online world free from rumors.

2. Needs Analysis

In order to strengthen the initiative in controlling overseas social sentiment and effectively carry out daily network special investigation work targeting overseas social platforms, it is necessary to establish a system for guiding and controlling public sentiment on Twitter to meet the current needs of network special investigation work.

6 Product Deployment

6.1 Applicable Environment

The "Guoma Anti-Gambling Platform" provides professional comprehensive intelligent management functions for gambling-related clue queries and gambling business analysis, suitable for special business departments to crack down on illegal gambling crimes.

6.2 Deployment Method

The "Marrow Recognition Anti-Gambling Platform" often adopts SaaS mode, allowing users to log in with authorized accounts, so users do not need any hardware such as servers, only need to provide compliant terminals and accessible internet networks for deployment. Users can access the entire platform by purchasing client access software. Specific host configuration requirements are as follows:

7. Product Advantages

- Comprehensive and Reliable Data

The "Guoma Anti-Gambling Platform" provides comprehensive data on gambling-related users, offering law enforcement authorities a vast amount of information on gambling individuals' account data. Additionally, regular updates are conducted on the platform's data to ensure the accuracy, effectiveness, and reliability of the gambling-related data.

- Tailored to Business Scenarios

The platform is designed around the gambling business process. Users can utilize the platform to identify suspicious accounts, initiate cases, conduct comprehensive analysis and tracing, as well as achieve business objectives in investigations, providing a complete business process and target business handling approach.

- Stable and Reliable Platform

The "Suiying Anti-Gambling Platform" is designed based on SaaS services, with data updates and maintenance managed by professionals to ensure the entire platform can operate stably 24 hours a day. Additionally, timely after-sales support services are provided to users.

1 前

近年来，网络涉赌犯罪成为信息化时代衍生的问题，其活动日益猩狐,手法不断翻新,参与人员
不断增多,给社会经济秩序带来严重影响,给群众财产带来巨大损失。从全国来看,网络赌博已成为一

translated_text:
In recent years, online gambling crimes have become a problem derived from the information age, with activities increasingly rampant, methods constantly innovating, and the number of participants continuously increasing, bringing serious impacts to social and economic order and causing huge losses to the public. From a national perspective, online gambling has become a new type of financial crime, as it is fast, covert, and involves large amounts of money in wins and losses, making it a key focus for public security authorities alongside telecommunications fraud. Statistics show that the number of individuals involved in online gambling increases every year, with a trend towards younger participants.

The rise and spread of online gambling crimes have become a global focus, triggering significant social conflicts and risks. This new type of crime poses new challenges to China's judicial and administrative management. Compared to traditional gambling, online gambling does not involve physical cash but maintains its predatory speed.

Forums, software download sites, and video sharing platforms are known to provide various resources for online gambling, with some literary websites colluding with financial websites to attract gamblers. Online gambling websites often host their servers in regions like the Philippines, the United States, and Europe where gambling regulations are more lenient to evade detection. Compared to offline gambling, online gambling offers greater concealment and operates more efficiently, allowing bets to exceed 600 billion yuan. Overseas gambling websites are part of a complex network that involves various actors and "protective umbrellas," which is detrimental to maintaining a safe social order and national economic security.

The "Guoma Anti-Gambling Platform" is based on the need for regulating and combating the gambling industry. By addressing the phenomenon of online gambling crimes, the platform aims to cut off cross-border facilitation and prevent illegal activities. Some online gambling platforms even operate under the guise of legality. Players' transactions on these platforms act as a "money pump," siphoning billions of yuan out of mainland China annually.

Due to the lack of psychological pressure, individuals are more susceptible to addiction, leading to significant amounts of money flowing out of China due to gambling each year. The platform focuses on combating illegal online gambling activities, particularly targeting organizers, operators, and profiteers to safeguard national economic security.

By collecting data from major gambling websites, the platform enhances its ability to conduct comprehensive information queries and analysis on gambling activities, thereby improving its capacity to control and combat gambling crimes effectively.

(1) Targeted search for individuals involved in gambling activities

The "Guoma Anti-Gambling Platform" is built based on backend data from domestic and foreign gambling websites, allowing for targeted searches for individuals involved in gambling activities.

translated_text:
6 Product Deployment
6.1 Applicable Environment
The "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform" is a professional email data processing and analysis platform, suitable for users to perform structured processing and analysis on massive email data, quickly conduct analysis and judgment, and collaborative analysis in business scenarios. It is also suitable for users to establish their own massive email intelligence database application scenarios, comprehensively enhancing business personnel's efficiency in analyzing and judging email data.

6.2 Deployment Methods
The "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform" provides two application forms: public cloud and private cloud. The deployment method varies according to the different forms purchased by users.
> Public Cloud Deployment Method of "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform"
The "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform" in the public cloud is provided to users for login and use through authorized accounts. Therefore, users do not need to purchase servers, they only need to provide a computer that meets the requirements and an available internet connection to access and use the platform.

> Private Cloud Deployment Method of "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform"
Users of the "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision Platform" in the private cloud need to deploy the platform software locally in order to use it. They need to deploy the platform software on servers that meet the standards, and then they can log in to the platform through a browser to import, analyze, and judge email data. The entire platform deployment environment requirements are as follows:
System Parameters
Operating System: Windows/Linux
CPU: 16 cores, frequency >2.2GHz
Server Performance
Memory: 8G
Hard Drive Capacity: 2T
Cluster Function: Supported, performance increases linearly when using a cluster.

original_text:
7 ”产品优势

> ”准确性高

 

 

系统采用大数据架构和文本智能识别技术, 实现对海量邮件的快速分析、精准提取、 快速比对。

translated_text:
Preface

Email is a communication method that provides information exchange through electronic means, and it is the most widely used service on the Internet. Through the network's email system, users can communicate with network users from any corner of the world at a very low cost (regardless of where it is sent, only the internet fee needs to be borne) and very quickly (can be sent to any designated destination in the world within minutes).

With the rapid development of Internet technology, people use email to make communication and exchange easier and faster.

Various criminal and civil disputes involve email.

Email, with its new, fast, and economical characteristics, has become one of the indispensable important communication methods in modern society. At the same time, individuals have also begun to widely use email for various illegal activities, in many computer crime cases, and in business, email contains a wealth of useful information, which is one of the important contents for computer analysis and evidence collection. It can provide strong clues for case solving. To improve efficiency, people often use various email clients such as Foxmail, Outlook Express, and Microsoft Office Outlook to process emails. Therefore, analyzing the number of emails saved by various email clients is also an important means of computer analysis and evidence collection. Extracting the email addresses of interested parties, sender and recipient names, sending time, subject, email content, and attachments, and statistically classifying received and sent emails, using visual, interpersonal network analysis, and other technologies to draw time relationship diagrams of emails and interpersonal network relationships, provide a good reference basis for analyzing and discovering hidden relationships between senders and recipients.

2. Needs Analysis

The construction of an "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System" based on massive email data should fully meet the comprehensive analysis, mining of personal information of email characters, email character relationship networks, and the search of email systems, and can realize the import, analysis, and judgment of massive email data.

(1) Email Data Retrieval Function

Attributes such as email sender, recipient, time, subject, email content, and attachment extraction. Through this, the retrieval of email data can be achieved.

translated_text:
To ensure quick retrieval of key information and identification of key evidence in a massive amount of email data to enhance analytical efficiency, the construction of the "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System" should be able to meet the requirements for fast analysis and real-time retrieval of terabyte-level email data. Users can quickly search and query relevant emails by using keywords.

In order to analyze emails related to a single individual in a massive amount of emails and highlight the individual's relevant information, the construction of the Analysis Intelligence Decision System should be able to provide comprehensive analysis functions for individual target emails, enabling analysis and display of semantic habits, relationship networks, personal information, and other integrated data related to the target emails.

To establish email communication relationships within a group or organization and record the activity organizational structure of the target group or organization, the construction of the Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System should enable collaborative analysis by multiple individuals. The system can mark, annotate, and manage different emails for collaborative analysis.

For more effective management of massive email data, the construction of the Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System should provide comprehensive management functions for email data, allowing real-time monitoring of the total volume of email data in the system, types of email languages, etc., to ensure reliable and stable system operation.

Product Introduction

Product Overview

The "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System" is developed based on text recognition big data technology, supporting rapid identification and analysis of massive email data, extracting intelligence information such as keywords, sensitive words, personal relationships, contact information, etc.

Product Components

The "Email Analysis Intelligence Decision System" supports two forms: private cloud and public cloud. The private cloud involves users setting up a complete local independent platform, while the public cloud adopts a SaaS model, allowing access and usage through authorized accounts.

4.2.1 Condition Filtering Settings
Condition filtering settings mainly include relationship calculation, filtering settings, creating relationships, and recovering deleted functions. The main functions of each function point are as follows:

1) Relationship Calculation: Mainly optimize parameters such as target type, relationship type, target list, relationship dimension, maximum number of points, etc., to display and present the target relationship network that meets expectations.

2) Filtering Settings: Can filter the generated relationship network, filtering out unnecessary relationship types and targets in the relationship network.

3) Creating Relationships: Based on the target contact information already mastered, create a relationship to associate with the massive data of the entire system for analysis.

4) Recovering Deletion: In the generated relationship network, unnecessary points can be deleted, and deleted relationship points can also be restored to the relationship network.

4.2.2 Single Target Comparative Analysis

After the system analyzes the target, it will compare and analyze all information such as identity information, relationship graph, sensitive language, activity records, suspected accounts, etc., and support generating report documents for printing analysis.
